newsitem.title: ANGOLA: Port conditions update - Angola - Lloyds Shipping.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update - Angola - Lloyds Shipping.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

LUANDA, Aug 21 - Port currently experiencing minor berthing delays at general cargo berths due to reduction of transport collecting cargoes from quays by private receivers. Container and ro-ro berths operating normally.
LOBITO, NAMIBE - no berthing delays reported.
CABINDA - delays reported for discharge at anchorage.
SOYO - no berthing delays reported for cargoes for Kwanda base. All crude terminals loading according to programme.
